articles.content: Particles from meteors or volcanic eruptions on Earth around 4.4 billion years ago may have generated the precursors of the molecules needed for the origin of life on the planet, according to a study… [+2579 chars]

articles.title: Vitamin D deficiency affects dopaminergic neuron differentiation in schizophrenia - Tech Explorist
articles.description: Vitamin D deficiency affects developing neurons in schizophrenia by using new technology.
articles.content:
Vitamin D has been found as an important element in the development and differentiation of dopaminergic neurons.
The University of Queensland’s neuroscientists has used cutting-edge technology to re… [+3226 chars]
